trans-unit.source: Describes how cells of a DataGridView control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 描述要如何選取 DataGridView 控制項的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉用來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Set the Selection Mode of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的選取範圍模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: One or more individual cells can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以選取一或多個儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The column will be selected by clicking in the column's header cell.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下資料行行首儲存格來選取資料行。

trans-unit.source: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下個別儲存格來選取該儲存格。

trans-unit.source: The entire column will be selected by clicking the column's header or a cell contained in that column.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下資料行行首或是包含在該資料行中的儲存格來選取整個資料行。

trans-unit.source: The entire row will be selected by clicking its row's header or a cell contained in that row.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下資料列行首或是包含在該資料列中的儲存格來選取整個資料列。

trans-unit.source: The row will be selected by clicking in the row's header cell.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下資料列行首儲存格來選取資料列。

trans-unit.source: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.
trans-unit.target: 可以按一下個別儲存格來選取該儲存格。
